name: Building Blocks (BergreKeneta)
description:
This is a puzzle game I made for a college course, during gameplay you have differently texture spheres and you need to knock them into the right ones to make more in order to get the sphere that wins the level.

you can move the character with either the "WASD" or arrow keys, moving the mouse moves the camera and clicking on an object makes it follow the player but it also still rolls about.
